title: [HOLD for payment 2023-03-13] [$4000] Able to change timezone through direct link even when the automatically determine location switch is on
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to Settings > Profile
2. Go to Timezone
3. Toggle off the automatically determine location switch
4. Click on Timezone
5. Copy the URL of the select timezone page
6. Go back and toggle on the automatically determine location switch
7. In the address bar, paste the copied URL and press enter

Expected result: The controls should be disabled, with only the ability to go back

Actual result: None
